plot: Both Aang and Zuko must learn the history of how the war began. Zuko learns a secret about his great-grandfather's past.

Aang and Zuko both learn about how the war has started. Aang learns about Roku's history and life long friendship with Sozin. Zuko begins to learn about his paternal great-grandfather's history. Both Aang and Zuko discover that Roku and Sozin's friendship fell apart when Sozin wanted to expand his nation to further his personal agenda. Zuko confronts Iroh in prison and he soon realizes that his maternal great-grandfather is Avatar Roku. Iroh tells Zuko he can still do the right thing by redeeming the Fire Nation's honor and undo his family's past sins to the world. Iroh gives Zuko a long lost Royal artifact which is a Royal headpiece that was previously worn by Sozin when he was the crown prince and he gave it to Roku when he became the Avatar.—dawsonpersi
